title: BioShock.Infinite.Complete.Edition-PROPHET
description:
BioShock Infinite *Complete* (c) 2K Games

release date ...: January 2768
protection .....: Steam + CEG
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT-BR/JP/KR/CN-T

Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on  the
line, veteran of the U.S.  Cavalry  and  now  hired
gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe
his  slate  clean.  He  must  rescue  Elizabeth,  a
mysterious  girl  imprisoned  since  childhood  and
locked up in the flying city of Columbia. Forced to
trust one another,  Booker  and  Elizabeth  form  a
powerful bond during their daring escape. Together,
they learn  to  harness  an  expanding  arsenal  of
weapons and abilities, as they fight  on  zeppelins
in the clouds, along high-speed Sky-Lines, and down
in the streets of Columbia, all while surviving the
threats of the air-city  and  uncovering  its  dark
secret.

This Complete Edition includes:

* Bioshock Infinite (main game)
* Burial at Sea - Episode One
* Burial at Sea - Episode Two
* Clash in the Clouds
* Comstock's China Broom Shotgun
* Comstock's Bird's Eye Sniper Rifle
* Industrial Revolution Rewards Pack
* Season Pass

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir to
<installdir>BinariesWin32 folder
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
This release includes audio localization for Burial
at Sea DLCs added recently on Steam
